parameters.name: AddrPoolId
parameters.description: The ID of the address pool that you want to modify.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description: The language used by the user.

parameters.name: MinAvailableAddrNum
parameters.description: The minimum number of available addresses in the address pool.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the address pool that you want to modify.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: The type of the address pool that you want to modify.
